actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend for 1 year (until June 30, 1974) the temporary increases in railroad retirement annuities and pensions provided by Public Laws 91-377, 92-46, and 92-460.

summary.text: Extends for one year, until June 30, 1974 the temporary increases in railroad retirement annunities and pensions provided by Public Law 91-377, 92-460.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 1 year (until June 30, 1974) the temporary increases in railroad retirement annuities and pensions provided by Public Laws 91-377, 92-46, and 92-460.
